channel.title: Mastermind Foresight on n1?
channel.description:
I just played a Mastermind game, and couldn't use Foresight n1 (or n2, though I had to Convert by then anyway). The skill was disabled and wouldn't pop a grid at all, so I don't think it was due to an offensive class but could be wrong. Once I lost an US member I could use it.
Is that normal?

item.title: Mastermind Foresight on n1?
item.dc:creator: geoelectric
item.description:
I just played a Mastermind game, and couldn’t use Foresight n1 (or n2, though I had to Convert by then anyway). The skill was disabled and wouldn’t pop a grid at all, so I don’t think it was due to an offensive class but could be wrong. Once I lost an US member I could use it.
